name: Zombie Surevival
description:
Caution there is gore Involved with the game, We don't recommend playing this game if you are below the age of 13. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Made for scorejam#23 it will be further developed for the next score jam hopefully. We submitted it just so we can have the backing to continue developing the game and more to come.  We would love a publishing deal once we finish certain bugs in the game.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 This is an entire story encapsulating a default zombie survival game, You will search for letters that harbor clues that may give you a fleeting chance for survival. Good luck... You will need it.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What doesn't function at the moment: 

~Enemy killing player (In Development)

~Game Ending (In Development)
